title: Issue with mouse recently
body:
So when I play a game lately, my mouse will lock up at certain times, it will freeze for 1-2 seconds sometimes, and other times it will not go where I would like it to, it can tell i am moving it, but it simply will not go where i tell it to go. as if it is hitting an invisible wall. Anyone else experience this or have any idea how to fix it?

It is not my mouse as that was my first thought and i went and got a new one, same problem.

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about these mouse issues, though it's good you tried another mouse to rule out that possibility.  Your config settings might be correct as well and not responding properly.  See if a config reset might fix this:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
